title: Democracy Now! 2022-10-27 Thursday
description:
Progressive House lawmakers send, then retract, a letter urging diplomacy with Russia; Peace talks begin in South Africa to end the Ethiopian conflict; Children’s hospitals across the United States see a rise in respiratory syncytial virus, or RSV.
